title: Simon.The.Sorcerer.2.25th.Anniversary.Edition-Razor1911
description:
[INSTALL NOTES] 
================ 

==> Install the Program 
==> After Install Launch/Run the Application Activate As Trial 
==> If Your Trail Time Ended Follow Bellow Steps 
==> Turn Of Internet [Wont Work Otherwise] 
==> Disable Kaspersky Self-Defense Setting [Just A Bit] 
==> Use Given Kaspersky Reset Trial To Reset Trial Again 
==> Enjoy and Support Developers, Buy It, They Deserved It!

--------

1. Extract release
2. Mount PC
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!
